plot: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
title: Drishyam
plot_es: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
plot_en: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.
